commoditycode.description: The 8 character Combined Nomenclature (CN) commodity code of the goods

commoditycodequalifier.description: Certain UK excise duties apply to different commodities which have the same commodity code, e.g.: handrolling vs. other types of loose tobacco

volume.description: The volume of the commodity, in litres, if the product is measured by volume (e.g. alchoholic beverages)

quantity.description: The number of commodity items, if the product is measured by number (e.g. cigarettes)

weight.description: The weight of the commodity, in grammes, if the product is measured by weight

value.description: The amount of money paid to purchase the commodity in it's country of origin

valuecurrency.description: The currency code for the commodity value

origin.description: The country code of the origin of the commodity

rrp.description: Recommended retail price of the product, per cigarette (commodity code must be 24022000)

abv.description: A.B.V measure of the commodity, if it is an alcoholic beverage, as a decimal
